text: Tomaloke se'i sampradayara lagata yud'dha nakaraibane, yisakale nijara pratisrauti bhanga karaiche arau raachulaka ola'i diyara babe sankalpa karaichila? Arau sihamte'i prathame tomalokara lagata (yud'dha) arambha karaiche. Tomaloke sihamtaka bhaya karaa neki? Allahaka bhaya karaahe tomalokara babe bechi samicina yadi tomaloke (prakrta) mumina
